mapper.insert: insert into member (username, password, name, email, phone, location,nickName) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone},#{location},#{nickName})
insert into memberrole (username, roleNum) values (#{username}, (select roleNum from role where roleName=#{roleName}))
mapper.select: SELECT M.*, R.* FROM member M LEFT JOIN memberrole MR ON M.username=MR.username LEFT JOIN role R ON MR.roleNum = R.roleNum WHERE M.username=#{username}
select username from member where email=#{email} and name =#{name}
select * from member where username=#{username} and email=#{email} and name =#{name}
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password} where username=#{username}
